import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from"@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react";// create the api
export var appApi=createApi({reducerPath:"appApi",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:"https://online-shop-backend-h65l.onrender.com"}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{signup:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:"/users/signup",method:"POST",body:user};}}),login:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:"/users/login",method:"POST",body:user};}}),// creating product
createProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(product){return{url:"/products",body:product,method:"POST"};}}),deleteProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(_ref){var product_id=_ref.product_id,user_id=_ref.user_id;return{url:"/products/".concat(product_id),body:{user_id:user_id},method:"DELETE"};}}),updateProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(product){return{url:"/products/".concat(product.id),body:product,method:"PATCH"};}}),// add to cart
addToCart:builder.mutation({query:function query(cartInfo){return{url:"/products/add-to-cart",body:cartInfo,method:"POST"};}}),// remove from cart
removeFromCart:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/products/remove-from-cart",body:body,method:"POST"};}}),// increase cart
increaseCartProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/products/increase-cart",body:body,method:"POST"};}}),// decrease cart
decreaseCartProduct:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/products/decrease-cart",body:body,method:"POST"};}}),// create order
createOrder:builder.mutation({query:function query(body){return{url:"/orders",method:"POST",body:body};}})};}});var useSignupMutation=appApi.useSignupMutation,useLoginMutation=appApi.useLoginMutation,useCreateProductMutation=appApi.useCreateProductMutation,useAddToCartMutation=appApi.useAddToCartMutation,useRemoveFromCartMutation=appApi.useRemoveFromCartMutation,useIncreaseCartProductMutation=appApi.useIncreaseCartProductMutation,useDecreaseCartProductMutation=appApi.useDecreaseCartProductMutation,useCreateOrderMutation=appApi.useCreateOrderMutation,useDeleteProductMutation=appApi.useDeleteProductMutation,useUpdateProductMutation=appApi.useUpdateProductMutation;export{useSignupMutation,useLoginMutation,useCreateProductMutation,useAddToCartMutation,useRemoveFromCartMutation,useIncreaseCartProductMutation,useDecreaseCartProductMutation,useCreateOrderMutation,useDeleteProductMutation,useUpdateProductMutation};export default appApi;
